snippet.title: Fruit Ninja (In Real Life!) iPhone Trailer
snippet.description:
NINJAS HATE FRUIT!

▶︎ Subscribe to Halfbrick for more: http://bit.ly/HalfbrickYTSubscribe

▶︎ Download the App: https://halfbrick.com/rd_fn_trailers/ 

▶︎ Follow us on Social Media: 
Twitter: @Halfbrick
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/halfbrick/
 
Fruit Ninja is an exciting action game that is simple to play and impossible to put down! 

Swipe your finger across the screen to deliciously slash and splatter fruit like a true ninja warrior. But be careful of the bombs, which are explosive to the touch and will put a swift end to your juicy adventure!
 
Fruit Ninjas uses OpenFeint, so players can unlock achievements and shoot for the top of the global leaderboards while racking up OpenFeint points.
